review.reviewBody: I've never been disappointed with my Chicken Biryani order, always delicious!

The quality of food has deteriorated so much that it is unedible now. 
We ordered Haleem which tasted like ground raw lentils with Shaan masala. There was no meat in Haleem.
Very little previously frozen cubed meat in Nihari which is tasteless. Very less quantity in nihari also... Gravy is full of oil and the oil drips from the packaging. 
The owners are focused on supplying to frozen dishes to larger chains and don't give a damn about restaurant quality or quantity. The manager was rude also and told me everything was OK and everyone eats the dishes  and doesn't complain. He asked me to bring back the food to inspect like I was lying. Don't order here until they fix their quality and customer service.
The philly cheese I had at the foodfest was so tasty, the one I ordered was something totally different. 5 stars if you could please bring back the one from the food festival.
mughlai chicken handi was the winner of the dinner order! everyone loved it! absolute winner. and the kheer is divine! bless your business

Beef Bihari Kabab was disgusting. It looked and tasted like raw puréed beef porridge than actual Bihari Kabab. That is NOT how you make this dish. Please educate your staff better on how to properly cook Bihari Kabab. Had to throw the whole thing out. Naan however was great.
